entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries ending after midnight then clearing. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
